import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Resource } from '../../../DTO/resource'; import { ResourceService } from '../../../Services/resource/resource.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-resource-share', templateUrl: './resource-share.component.html', styleUrls: ['./resource-share.component.css'] }) export class ResourceShareComponent implements OnInit { selectedResource: Resource; recipientEmail: string; errorMessage: string; constructor( private route: ActivatedRoute, private router: Router, private resourceService: ResourceService ) { } ngOnInit(): void { const resourceId = this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get('id'); this.loadResource(resourceId); } loadResource(id: string): void { this.resourceService.getResource(id).subscribe( (resource: Resource) => { this.selectedResource = resource; }, (error: any) => { this.errorMessage = 'Failed to load resource.'; } ); } share(): void { // Implement your sharing logic here // You can use this.selectedResource and this.recipientEmail to send the resource to the recipient // Once sharing is done, you can navigate to another page or perform any other actions } }
